content: pineapple granny square blanket pattern *****this pattern is available for free on my website at https //www nautikrallcrochet com/blog-freepatterns/pineapplegrannysquareblanket this listing is for those who wish to have an advertisement free pattern or printable copy it s bright fun and perfectly summer what is it about pineapples i just love them…to eat and to look at i wanted a simple yet colourful version of a pineapple to curl up in made with simple 3-round starburst squares cozy yarns and seamed together later this granny square blanket is good enough to eat this pattern is worked up using a version of a starburst granny square in this pattern i use wool of the andes worsted weight yarn from wecrochet 110yds/50g and a 5mm hook pattern includes all colours used and the yarn quantities as well as exact positioning i include a colour chart with photos of the actual yarn so that you can find substitutes if you like the colour selection i chose for my blanket my gift to you is taking the work out of colourwork the final blanket size was approximately 51 x 64 pattern will include - yarn amounts/quantities - yarn colours - yarn recommendations and links - stitch glossary - printable pdf of blanket graph - full colour chart of all squares and their positioning so you can make this exact colour copy - full written instruction for the granny squares used finn starburst granny square - written tutorial for border - video tutorials for the granny square as well as the slip_stitch method of assembling the squares happy crocheting everyone l m
